name: AVAssetWriterInputCaptionAdaptor
desc: An object that appends captions to an asset writer input.

items.name: init(assetWriterInput: AVAssetWriterInput)
items.desc: Creates a new caption adaptor that writes to the specified asset writer input.

items.name: func append(AVCaption) -> Bool
items.desc: Appends a caption to the writer input.

items.name: func append(AVCaptionGroup) -> Bool
items.desc: Appends a caption group that the system writes to the output.
